title: Issue login-in at chase.com
content:
Since the latest update v82.0.2 i can not login into chase.com. At first i thought something happened with firefox. Use Edge to log in an no problems at all. Coming back to FF at chase.com loads fine. As soon as i log in im presented with missing layouts buttons and no text. Under the Network monitor i see that a lot of scripts and json files are blocked or empty(0 bytes).

Is anyone else experiencing this issue ? Prior version of FF worked just fine. What happened ?
creator: danibaies

title: Firefox Internet Speed
content: Renewed with ISP and now am getting "up to" 600 Mbps download speed. I have a wired connection. I actually get over 700 on Opera, and about 550 on Chrome. With Firefox, I usually get about 280. I feel certain it is the browser - that is the only difference. Even wireless is fast. I have already tried different router ports, cables, disabling add-on's, etc. My version is up to date. I wonder if there is some setting I need to adjust to get the higher speeds. My preference is to stay with this browser, but not at the cost of speed. Appreciate any help!
creator: blumbergjs

title: getting some recent iastorea.sys blue screen errors
content:
my system has been "surprisingly stable" for a year or two. during the past couple of weeks, I've started having bsod iastorea.sys irc_not_equal type errors (intel rapid storage technology). it's happened twice in 2 weeks - so it's not a one-off

I haven't changed anything noticeable in the system recently. no driver updates.

the crashes have happened at exactly (exactly) the same point on the two occasions, both have been saving a jpg image in firefox (from instagram).

has anything changed recently in firefox?

win 7, Ff 82.0.2 (64-bit)
creator: tp_2346

title: Yo soy
content: Mi problema es que apenas entro a la aplicación se me salen sola sin yo salir es Pinterest estos días está fallando mucho
creator: iimmetn

title: Google search results
content: Ever since the new firefox update I am having problems with google's search results page. If I try scrolling up or down with the Up/Down arrows or the PageUp/Down buttons. It's as if there is suggestions still hidden on the page that it still wants to scroll through. Is there something I can do to fix this?
creator: crispyhq

title: Website doesn't remember computer and brwoser
content: I wonder if there is any change to the firefox. After I re-install the system, I notice every few days my active login to sites such yahoo mail and facebook will gone. Not only I need to enter password but also I will have to enter txt verification code again as I never log in those site before.
creator: hchsiao
